org.fcrepo.utilities

Class ExecUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.utilities.ExecUtility

  • public class ExecUtility
extends Object
    Utility class for executing commands and sending the command's output to a given OutputStream.
    Author:
    Edwin Shin
